title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Sept. 8
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Sept. 8
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Yelena Shulyatyeva Senior US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Trump keeps hope alive on taxes for stock investors." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
